meanings.sent1: The states decided to federate for better protection.
meanings.sent2: Countries often federate to work together on common goals.
meanings.sent3: The animals decided to federate and form a forest alliance.
meanings.sent4: The students federated their efforts to create a successful project.
meanings.sent5: The superheroes federated to defeat the villain and save the city.

meanings.sent1: She was proud to be a federate of the organization.
meanings.sent2: The country sent its best federates to represent them at the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The young boy pretended to be a federate of the superhero team.
meanings.sent4: As a federate, he had certain privileges within the group.
meanings.sent5: The federates gathered to discuss important matters affecting their community.
